Repel Legions.name: Repel Legions
Repel Legions.flavor: You force back the legions or your enemy, which allows you to focus your ire on the one you came to slay.
Repel Legions.effect: The burst creates a zone of destruction and repulsion that lasts until the end of your next turn. Each enemy that starts its turn within the zone automatically takes 15 radiant and necrotic damage and is pushed 3 squares away from you. If an enemy starts its turn within the zone and ends its turn adjacent to you, you push that enemy 5 squares as a free action.
Repel Legions.sustainMinor: The zone persists. When you move, the zone moves with you, keeping you at its center.
